name: T-Mobile Military Discount
description: ~20% off monthly plans, Netflix included on Go5G plans
fullDescription: T-Mobile offers special military pricing on wireless plans for active military, veterans, and their families, with Netflix included on select plans.
whatTheyOffer:
- Essentials Military: $90/month for 3 lines (nearly 20% savings)
- Go5G Military plans with Netflix included
- Available for all consumer plans
- Gold Star families eligible
- Veteran-owned businesses also qualify
howToGetIt:
1. Visit T-Mobile store or t-mobile.com/cell-phone-plans/military-discount-plans
2. Choose Essentials Military or Go5G Military plan
3. Verify military status
4. Military member/veteran must be primary account holder
5. Maintain valid military line on account
keywords: T-Mobile, military discount, veteran, active duty, National Guard, Reserve, Gold Star, cell phone, wireless plan
